lom:description.lom:string: "Computational Thinking: By coining the term "computational thinking," Jeannette Wing, Head of the Computer Science Department at Carnegie Mellon, encapsulated both the answer to the question, "What is computer science" and a viewpoint on how computer science is revolutionizing not only all the sciences, but impacting every aspect of our lives in the 21st century." Full text of article available at website plus link the the Computational Thinking paper and related references.
